list.name: Changes
list.comment:
2. I changed the code so that it listens to the RFID-Reader all the time and not just after the start button is pushed.
1. Bugs seem to be fixed now Eventually we need to add a function that deletes all .txt files to troubleshoot an issue that sometimes occurs when the code wasn't completely executed before. (.txt files are not empty then)
